update sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_PAY
BELONG_MONTH = #{belongMonth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PARTICIPANT = #{participant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTICIPANT_TYPE = #{participantType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AWARD_KPI_SUM = #{awardKpiSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AWARD_STEP = #{awardStep,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_COUNT = #{caseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_COUNT = #{userCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_PAY set BELONG_MONTH = #{belongMonth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PARTICIPANT = #{participant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTICIPANT_TYPE = #{participantType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AWARD_KPI_SUM = #{awardKpiSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AWARD_STEP = #{awardStep,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_COUNT = #{caseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_COUNT = #{userCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_PAY set STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DATEDIFF(mm,BELONG_MONTH,#{belongMonth}) = 0;
update ab set ab.paid_time=GETDATE() from sctrans.t_ts_award_base ab inner join sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_PAY_detail payt on ab.pkid=payt.award_base_id left join sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_PAY pay on pay.pkid = payt.award_kpi_pay_id where DATEDIFF(mm,pay.BELONG_MONTH,#{belongMonth}) = 0;
